text: The Kawasaki Versys is a family of adventure touring motorcycles manufactured by Kawasaki since 2007. *Versys-X 250/300, 2017–present, based on the twin- cylinder Ninja 250R/300. *Versys 650, 2007–present, based on the twin-cylinder ER-6n/f. *Versys 1000, 2012–present, based on the four-cylinder Z1000. Versys Category:Standard motorcycles
title: Kawasaki Versys
